currentProject.quote: One of my favorite things about Jordan is how he brings joy to his daily work. With a good touch of humor and humility, he finds ways to elicit collaboration from each team member, celebrate their successes, and support them as they learn new things. <mark> He creates a collaborative and fun culture within his project teams that make them the envy of all the other project teams.</mark>
